net.sourceforge.cilib.Container.Graph
Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.cilib.Container.Graph.Vertex
public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a Vertex as defined in a Graph in modern Graph theory. The vertex has incident and eminating edges.

Author:
Gary Pampara
